block.p: A guide to cultural and recreational goings-on in and around Westchester and Putnam Counties this week. Items for the guide should be sent at least three weeks in advance to westweek@nytimes.com, or by mail to Westchester Cultural Calendar, 620 Eighth Avenue, New York, N.Y. 10018.
FILM

Peekskill ''The Cats of Mirikitani,'' documentary by Linda Hattendorf; in Japanese and English; followed by a question-and-answer session with Ms. Hattendorf. June 24 at 3 p.m. $10. Paramount Center for the Arts, 1008 Brown Street. (914) 739-2333.

Pleasantville ''Classic Italian Cinema,'' series of film screenings. Schedule and information: burnsfilmcenter.com. Through Wednesday. $6.50 to $13. ''War and Peace,'' directed by Sergei Bondarchuk; screening from a new print of the 425-minute film, with one hour-long intermission; in Russian with English subtitles, hosted by Simon Schama. June 24 at 11 a.m. $30 and $45. Jacob Burns Film Center, 364 Manville Road. (914) 747-5555.

Armonk Harry Potter party, with wand-making, chocolate frogs and trivia. Ages 9 to 14. Thursday at 4 p.m. Free; reservations required. North Castle Public Library, 19 Whippoorwill Road. (914) 273-3887.
Bronx ''Mud, Buds and Blooms,'' family activity. Through June 29. New York Botanical Garden, Bronx River Parkway and Fordham Road. (718) 817-8616.
Croton-on-Hudson ''Sherlock Holmes Takes the Case,'' interactive theater by Traveling Lantern. June 23 at 2:30 p.m. Free. Croton Free Library, 171 Cleveland Drive. (914) 271-6612.
Scarsdale ''Creatures of Woodfrog Pond,'' family program. June 17 at 2 p.m. $3 and $5. Greenburgh Nature Center, 99 Dromore Road. (914) 723-3470.
Tarrytown ''Bouncing Babies.'' Tuesday through June 26. Free. ''Fun for Four and Fives.'' Tuesday through June 26. Free. Warner Public Library, 121 North Broadway. (914) 631-7734.
Yonkers ''Music and Merriment,'' children's program. Ages 2 to 5. Through Wednesday. Yonkers Crestwood Library, 16 Thompson Street. (914) 337-1500, Extension 360.

Pawling Bill Kirchen and the Hammer of the Honky-Tonk Gods. Friday at 9 p.m. $20 and $22.50. The Strawbs, reunion concert. June 23 at 9 p.m. $35 and $37.50. Towne Crier Cafe, 130 Route 22. (845) 855-1300.
